name: 1937 (ThiagoSM)
description:
Description :

1937 is a 2D platform game built on the Unity engine. It is a simple and easy game to play, what you have to do is collect all the coins that are on the map without touching the obstacles, once you have collected all the coins on the map a door opens, when you go through that door you will advance to the next level.

Features and Mechanics:

• Simple but entertaining experience.

• Game Pixel Art in black and white.

• Collect all the coins in the level to advance to the next.

• You will control one or more players depending on the level.

• Avoiding touching obstacles.

IMPORTANT!

Only I am skinning this video game: Any type of comment supporting me will brighten my day and will help me continue with this and other projects.

I will update the game soon with better features! Thank you for your understanding!

To report bugs (or anything else), you can email me at thiagosm2019@gmail.com
